summary:
**Capital Raising Announcement:**  
- **Structure:** Initial Public Offering (IPO) via Prospectus.  
- **Capital Raised:** AUD 7.5 million (37.5 million shares at AUD 0.20 each).  
- **Capital Structure Post-Listing:**  
  - 117.5 million fully paid ordinary shares.  
  - 5 million unquoted options (AUD 0.30 exercise, expiring May 2028).  
  - Additional 1.35 million unquoted options (AUD 0.30 exercise, 3-year expiry) to be issued to employees/contractors (subject to vesting).  
- **Restricted Securities:**  
  - 65.3% of shares (79.995 million) and 4.1% of options (5 million) subject to 24-month escrow.  
- **Debt Repayment:** AUD 1.022 million (principal + interest) repaid on unsecured loan facility.  
- **Compliance:** No impediments to exploration spending on West Arunta Project (Listing Rule 1.3.2(b)).  

*Omitted: Boilerplate, director/contact details, legal terms.*
